ai-patthana16.77:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.77:0.3_0: used to be exhausted by the attachment for the clinging.
ai-patthana16.77:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause of impingement, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-patthana16.77:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.77:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to defilements, nor get rid of defilements.
ai-patthana16.77:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
